content: make some pretty crochet flowers and attach them to some bobby pins these are so easy and fast to make you could whip up one in each of your favourite colours pattern uses us crochet terms and you can find uk terms in abbreviations **materials** scraps of 4 ply/fingering weight cotton yarn for the flowers but you can use any yarn weight you wish just use a matching hook 3mm crochet hook pearl beads bobby pins/hair grips glue gun suggested hook sizes dk weight 3 5mm hook 4 ply/fingering weight 2 5mm or 3 00mm hook
